news.title: YouTube Is Testing a New Way for Creators to Make Money from Viewers
news.description: YouTube creators may soon be able to access a new means of raising funds directly from viewers with a feature that allows viewers to purchase “applause” on any video at any time.

news.title: New Instagram Feature Helps Users Clean Up Their Following List
news.description: Instagram is rolling out a new feature that allows users to refine their feeds by grouping accounts they are following into categories such as seen most often or least interacted with.

news.title: Twitter Will Ban ‘Deceptive’ Faked Media That Could Cause ‘Serious Harm’
news.description: Twitter is banning fake pictures, video, and other potentially harmful content, and will also start labeling and giving more context to media that has been significantly “manipulated.”

news.title: YouTube Is the Frontrunner in the Mobile Streaming Wars, and It’s Not Even Close
news.description: New research shows that YouTube accounts for 70 percent of the total time users spend viewing content on their phones in the top five entertainment apps, which include Netflix.
